page.title: 18Home Life
page.content:
In Tayport the standard of living is{ {quite high.}A good amount of people are{reasonably }well off.
After surveying some of the residents of Tayport we got these results.
It was found that{31%}of households have cats,{26%}have dogs and{28% have {other pets.}It was also found that{23% have a computer,{20%}have a video recorder and{13%}have a stereo.Also{ {100%}of the people have a garden,{6%} have a microwave oven and{10%}have a dishwasher.
From the survey it is noticeable that we have a{pet-loving}community with only{15%}without a pet.
